Class ReservationFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.Reservation
      • assignment.ReservationFile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrderFile

    public class ReservationFile
extends Reservation
    Inherited base class of Reservation, which is used to add a reservation, and the details of a reservation onto the file. Also, it reads the data from the text file and
    Author:
    salonigupta

      boolean addReservation(java.util.Date d)
      addReservation() adds a reservation by taking the details of a customer, table ID.
      void dataTransferFromFile()
      dataTransferFromFile() reads the data of all reservations from the text file and loads it into an array of objects of class Reservation.

      dataTransferToFile() writes the reservation details on the text file.
      void printData()
      printData() prints the details of all reservations made after reading them from the text file.

      removeReservationRewrite() is rewrites the reservation file when a particular reservation is cancelled.

      • setAvailability

        public void setAvailability()
        Sets the validity of a reservation , i.e. whether a table is currently booked or not. When a reservation is valid, available is false otherwise true.

      • addReservation

        public boolean addReservation(java.util.Date d)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        addReservation() adds a reservation by taking the details of a customer, table ID. It checks whether the customer is a member or not, and returns true if the customer is a member.
        Parameters:
        d - is a date object which is used to note the time when the reservation is made.
        Returns:
        found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
